spaceinvaders.client.network

Class NetworkConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceinvaders.client.network.NetworkConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>, Service<java.lang.Void>

    public class NetworkConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Service<java.lang.Void>
    Network connection with the server.

    Establishes a connection and handles I/O operations.

                  throws SocketOpeningException
        Configure a new network connection.
        Parameters:
        incomingQueue - used for transfering incoming data.
